title: MRPL Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 02 Graduate/ Diploma Apprentice Posts
description: The Mangalore Refinery and Petrochemicals (MRPL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Graduate Apprentice and Diploma Apprentice Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Electrical, Mechanical,  Electronics, Civil Engineering, Diploma holders can apply for the MRPL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend th...
